name: coordinator
content:

someone whose job is to make different groups work together in an organized way to achieve something: We've just appointed a coordinator who will oversee the whole project. He is recycling coordinator for the county.coordinator of She is the co-ordinator of the upcoming state visit.
More examplesFewer examplesShe is project coordinator for a global research consortium.Susan is community outreach coordinator for the Ohio Environmental Council.He was the esteemed co-ordinator of many foreign relief efforts.They have coordinators who act as liaisons between patients and medical staff. If you are an event co-ordinator, communicating your own commitment and conviction is vital.
